languages.text: "А вот это я запрещаю". {n}Губернатор решительно сжимает кулак.{/n} "При всем почтении к святости вашего монастыря, у меня тут целая столица, которая нуждается в опеке слуг Омниссии. Мы потеряли многих высокопоставленных техножрецов, — одного, кстати, в этом самом монастыре, — механизмы могут начать ломаться в любой момент... В общем, считайте, что я недобровольно рекрутирую вас в корпус обороны города". {n}Решительные взгляды губернатора и техножреца скрещиваются, словно пара клинков.{/n}

"I categorically object." {n}The governor clenches his fist.{/n} "As much as I respect the sanctity of your monastery, I have on my hands a whole capital that needs to be attended by the Omnissiah's servants. We have lost many eminent Tech-Priests — incidentally, one of them perished in that same monastery. Mechanical failures could occur at any moment. Putting it bluntly, you may consider yourself forcibly recruited into the city's defence forces." {n}Medineh and Pasqal glare at each other, their unyielding gazes like crossed swords.{/n}

В общем, считайте, что я недобровольно рекрутирую вас в корпус обороны города". {n}Решительные взгляды губернатора и техножреца скрещиваются, словно пара клинков.{/n}

Putting it bluntly, you may consider yourself forcibly recruited into the city's defence forces." {n}Medineh and Pasqal glare at each other, their unyielding gazes resembling crossed swords.{/n}

We have lost many eminent Tech-Priests — incidentally, one of them perished in that same monastery. Mechanical failures could occur at any moment. Putting it bluntly, you may consider yourself forcibly recruited into the city's defence forces." {n}Medineh and Pasqal glare at each other, their unyielding gazes like crossed swords.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich muss entschieden widersprechen." {n}Der Gouverneur ballt seine Faust.{/n} "So sehr ich die Heiligkeit Eures Klosters schätze, ich bin für eine ganze Hauptstadt verantwortlich, die der Hilfe der Diener des Omnissiah bedarf. Wir haben viele bedeutende Techpriester verloren ... einer fand übrigens in eben diesem Kloster den Tod. Es könnten jederzeit mechanische Fehlfunktionen auftreten. Offen gesagt könnt Ihr davon ausgehen, gewaltsam für die Verteidigung der Stadt rekrutiert zu werden." {n}Medineh und Pasqal starren sich unnachgiebig an, als würden sie die Schwerter kreuzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I categorically object." {n}The governor clenches his fist.{/n} "As much as I respect the sanctity of your monastery, I have on my hands a whole capital that needs to be attended by the Omnissiah's servants. We have lost many eminent Tech-Priests — incidentally, one of them perished in that same monastery. Mechanical failures could occur at any moment. Putting it bluntly, you may consider yourself forcibly recruited into the city's defence forces." {n}Medineh and Pasqal glare at each other, their unyielding gazes like crossed swords.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss entschieden widersprechen." {n}Der Gouverneur ballt seine Faust.{/n} "So sehr ich die Heiligkeit Eures Klosters schätze, ich bin für eine ganze Hauptstadt verantwortlich, die der Hilfe der Diener des Omnissiah bedarf. Wir haben viele bedeutende Techpriester verloren ... einer fand übrigens in eben diesem Kloster den Tod. Es könnten jederzeit mechanische Fehlfunktionen auftreten. Offen gesagt könnt Ihr davon ausgehen, gewaltsam für die Verteidigung der Stadt rekrutiert zu werden." {n}Medineh und Pasqal starren sich unnachgiebig an, als würden sie die Schwerter kreuzen.{/n}

languages.text: « Je m'y oppose catégoriquement, {n}s'exclame le gouverneur en serrant le poing.{/n} J'ai beau respecter la sainteté de votre monastère, j'ai toute une capitale qui a besoin des serviteurs de l'Omnimessie. Nous avons perdu beaucoup d'éminents technoprêtres, et d'ailleurs, l'un d'eux a péri dans ce même monastère. Des pannes mécaniques pourraient survenir à tout moment. Je ne vais pas y aller par quatre chemins, je vous recrute de force dans les troupes de défense de la cité. » {n}Medineh et Pasqal se toisent avec fureur, leurs regards se croisant comme des épées.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I categorically object." {n}The governor clenches his fist.{/n} "As much as I respect the sanctity of your monastery, I have on my hands a whole capital that needs to be attended by the Omnissiah's servants. We have lost many eminent Tech-Priests — incidentally, one of them perished in that same monastery. Mechanical failures could occur at any moment. Putting it bluntly, you may consider yourself forcibly recruited into the city's defence forces." {n}Medineh and Pasqal glare at each other, their unyielding gazes like crossed swords.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je m'y oppose catégoriquement, {n}s'exclame le gouverneur en serrant le poing.{/n} J'ai beau respecter la sainteté de votre monastère, j'ai toute une capitale qui a besoin des serviteurs de l'Omnimessie. Nous avons perdu beaucoup d'éminents technoprêtres, et d'ailleurs, l'un d'eux a péri dans ce même monastère. Des pannes mécaniques pourraient survenir à tout moment. Je ne vais pas y aller par quatre chemins, je vous recrute de force dans les troupes de défense de la cité. » {n}Medineh et Pasqal se toisent avec fureur, leurs regards se croisant comme des épées.{/n}

languages.text: “我坚决反对。”{n}总督握紧了拳头。{/n}“虽然我很尊重您前往修道院的神圣意愿，但我的首都需要欧姆尼塞亚的仆人保护。我们已经失去了许多位杰出的技术神甫，顺便说一句，其中一名技术神甫就死在了那间修道院。这里随时可能会发生机械故障，如果您要我直说的话，您可以认为，我已经强行将您征召到了这座城市的城防部队。”{n}梅迪涅和帕斯卡互相怒目而视，不屈不挠的目光就像两把利剑互相碰撞。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I categorically object." {n}The governor clenches his fist.{/n} "As much as I respect the sanctity of your monastery, I have on my hands a whole capital that needs to be attended by the Omnissiah's servants. We have lost many eminent Tech-Priests — incidentally, one of them perished in that same monastery. Mechanical failures could occur at any moment. Putting it bluntly, you may consider yourself forcibly recruited into the city's defence forces." {n}Medineh and Pasqal glare at each other, their unyielding gazes like crossed swords.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我坚决反对。”{n}总督握紧了拳头。{/n}“虽然我很尊重您前往修道院的神圣意愿，但我的首都需要欧姆尼塞亚的仆人保护。我们已经失去了许多位杰出的技术祭司，顺便说一句，其中一名技术祭司就死在了那间修道院。这里随时可能会发生机械故障，如果您要我直说的话，您可以认为，我已经强行将您征召到了这座城市的城防部队。”{n}梅迪涅和帕斯卡互相怒目而视，不屈不挠的目光就像两把利剑互相碰撞。{/n}

languages.text: 「断固反対します」{n}総督は拳を握りしめた。{/n}「神聖なる修道院には敬意を払っていますが、万機神のしもべを必要とする首都は私の手にかかっています。我々は多くの高名な技術司祭を失いました。偶然とはいえ、そのうちの一人はまさにこの修道院で亡くなりました。機械的エラーがいつ起こらないとも限らない。単刀直入に言えば、市の防衛軍に強制的に徴兵されたようなものです」{n}メディネとパスカルは睨み合い、双方の視線が剣のように交差した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I categorically object." {n}The governor clenches his fist.{/n} "As much as I respect the sanctity of your monastery, I have on my hands a whole capital that needs to be attended by the Omnissiah's servants. We have lost many eminent Tech-Priests — incidentally, one of them perished in that same monastery. Mechanical failures could occur at any moment. Putting it bluntly, you may consider yourself forcibly recruited into the city's defence forces." {n}Medineh and Pasqal glare at each other, their unyielding gazes like crossed swords.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「断固反対します」{n}総督は拳を握りしめた。{/n}「神聖なる修道院には敬意を払っていますが、万機神のしもべを必要とする首都は私の手にかかっています。我々は多くの高名な技術司祭を失いました。偶然とはいえ、そのうちの一人はまさにこの修道院で亡くなりました。機械的エラーがいつ起こらないとも限らない。単刀直入に言えば、市の防衛軍に強制的に徴兵されたようなものです」{n}メディネとパスカルは睨み合い、双方の視線が剣のように交差した。{/n}

languages.text: «Me opongo categóricamente». {n}El gobernador aprieta el puño.{/n} «Por mucho que respete la santidad de su monasterio, tengo una capital que necesita la ayuda de los servidores del Omnissiah. Hemos perdido a muchos eminentes tecnosacerdotes. Por cierto, uno de ellos pereció en ese mismo monasterio. Los fallos mecánicos pueden ocurrir en cualquier momento. En resumen, puede considerarse reclutado a la fuerza para defender la ciudad». {n}Medineh y Pasqal se miran fijamente, sus miradas inflexibles se cruzan como espadas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I categorically object." {n}The governor clenches his fist.{/n} "As much as I respect the sanctity of your monastery, I have on my hands a whole capital that needs to be attended by the Omnissiah's servants. We have lost many eminent Tech-Priests — incidentally, one of them perished in that same monastery. Mechanical failures could occur at any moment. Putting it bluntly, you may consider yourself forcibly recruited into the city's defence forces." {n}Medineh and Pasqal glare at each other, their unyielding gazes like crossed swords.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Me opongo categóricamente». {n}El gobernador aprieta el puño.{/n} «Por mucho que respete la santidad de su monasterio, tengo una capital que necesita la ayuda de los servidores del Omnissiah. Hemos perdido a muchos eminentes tecnosacerdotes. Por cierto, uno de ellos pereció en ese mismo monasterio. Los fallos mecánicos pueden ocurrir en cualquier momento. En resumen, puede considerarse reclutado a la fuerza para defender la ciudad». {n}Medineh y Pasqal se miran fijamente, sus miradas inflexibles se cruzan como espadas.{/n}

languages.text: "Katiyen olmaz." {n}Vali yumruğunu sıkıyor.{/n} "Manastırınızın mukaddesliğine saygı duysam da elimde Hermesih'in hizmetkârlarının alakasını bekleyen koca bir başkent var. Mümtaz Tekno Rahiplerimizi yitirdik, tesadüf eseri de birini aynı manastırda kaybettik. Her an her yerde mekanik arıza çıkabilir. Açık konuşmak gerekirse, kendinizi şehrin savunma birliklerine zorla alınmış olarak düşünebilirsiniz." {n}Medineh ve Pasqal birbirlerine ters ters bakıyorlar, yılmaz bakışları karşılıklı çekilmiş iki kılıç gibi.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I categorically object." {n}The governor clenches his fist.{/n} "As much as I respect the sanctity of your monastery, I have on my hands a whole capital that needs to be attended by the Omnissiah's servants. We have lost many eminent Tech-Priests — incidentally, one of them perished in that same monastery. Mechanical failures could occur at any moment. Putting it bluntly, you may consider yourself forcibly recruited into the city's defence forces." {n}Medineh and Pasqal glare at each other, their unyielding gazes like crossed swords.{/n}

Mümtaz Tekno Rahiplerimizi yitirdik, tesadüf eseri de birini aynı manastırda kaybettik. Her an her yerde mekanik arıza çıkabilir. Açık konuşmak gerekirse, kendinizi şehrin savunma birliklerine zorla alınmış olarak düşünebilirsiniz." {n}Medineh ve Pasqal birbirlerine ters ters bakıyorlar, yılmaz bakışları karşılıklı çekilmiş iki kılıç gibi.{/n}
